column5: As stated above, she passed away last night at our hospital, went in there because of stomach problems. She had multiple sclerosis, and was in a wheelchair for quite some time. Talked to my cousin tonight(her son) and for some reason, they have ordered an autopsy to be done, so the funeral will not be until saturday at best. So, I will be distracted waiting for more info.  I might show up here, I might not.  Don't make too big of a deal about this please, its life, it happens. You do not have to respond to this post with condolences. I am just letting everyone know that I might not be frequenting this board for a couple of days.  Take care everyone.  Tom
Be well Tom...and a fishing trip to reflect next week sounds 'bout right!  Wayne
Sorry to hear about your aunt Tom.  We'll be thinking about you and your family.  Don't stay away too long.  Joey & Tybo
sorry for the bad news.  Its never easy even if it is expected.
condolences from the martin family my friend.
Condolences are never required Tom, they are sent by friends, and while it may be a part of life, it still is a sad time.  Thoughts are with you and your family at this time...  Maureen
Later Tom.  The best to the family.
Sorry for the families loss Tom, keep your chin up.
Take care of yourself during this time!  Easton
Sorry to hear the sad news Tom, please accept our condolences. Expected or not, its hard to accept.  Hang in there Buddy!
Thanks for the heads up , as some of us would definately have noticed your absense...  Take care of yourself and your family ...  See you back here in a bit!  Jen
Sorry to hear of your sad news.  Thoughts are with you. Tony
